data.name: Smart Junior Academy - Summer
data.detailed_description:
Smart Junior Academy - Summer is one of four parts of Smart Junior Academy series.

Entertaining educational game for children (5-9 years).

Purpose: improvement of memory,concentration and learning skills through play.

Designed in cooperation with child psychology academics, in order to support development of memory, concentration and mathematical skills, as well as to extend common knowledge.

20 varied exercises
10 difficulty levels

Printable extras: colouring activities, worksheets.

• game themes refer to summer holiday atmosphere
• children learn the names of various plants, including flowers and cereal crops
• they learn to identify flags of different countries
• they learn sport disciplines

Great emphasis is placed on conveying information about natural environment in a fascinating way.

Part of the Smart Junior Academy series.
Try out all the 4 parts of the computer program and play and develop throughout the year!

data.short_description: This program for children is as much entertaining as educating. Beautiful winter theme and 20 varied exercises designed in cooperation with child psychology experts in order to support development of memory, concentration and mathematical skills, as well as to extend their common knowledge.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1,5 GHz
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
